definition: exterior surface/family relationship via females/to show (one's opinion)/a model/a table (listing information)/a form/a meter (measuring sth)
to decide/to determine/to execute (sb)/(of a dam etc) to breach or burst/definitely/certainly

sentences.english: The only difference is that government's shares would be nonvoting until the government sold the shares at a later date.
sentences.chinese: 唯一的区别就在于政府在出售股票之前不具有表决权。

sentences.english: You can have voting and non-voting shares.
sentences.chinese: 你可以将股份分为有表决权和无表决权两种。

sentences.english: You can have voting and non-voting shares.
sentences.chinese: 你可以将股份分为有表决权和无表决权两种。

sentences.english: The right to vote at shareholder’s meetings for the election of directors shall be observed.
sentences.chinese: 应该遵守股东大会上投票选举董事的表决权。

sentences.english: Voting is weighted by capital subscription.
sentences.chinese: 表决权的份量取决于认缴资本额。

sentences.english: Titulary members shall not be entitled to vote.
sentences.chinese: 名誉会员不享有表决权。

sentences.english: Men and women of eighteen and above are eligible to vote.
sentences.chinese: 年龄在十八岁以上的男女有投票表决权。

definition: consideration (in exchange for shares)/a quid pro quo
to own a controlling number of shares in a company
